roleset.name: to produce a caricature of
roleset.note: CARICATURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'caricature' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from caricature.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The first is that it represents an intense battle in what [James Thurber]*-1 used [*-1]to caricature [*T*-2] as `` the war between the sexes . ''
example.arg: as the war between the sexes
